hint.text: The coordinates of a point are of the form (+ , +) in the first quadrant, (-, +) in the second quadrant, (-, -) in the third quadrant and (+, -) in the fourth quadrant, where + denotes a positive real number and - denotes a negative real number.

solution.text: Since the coordinates of the point are of the form (+ , +), it lies in the First Quadrant
